tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT,
    match_id INT,
    points_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    blocks INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
  player_id INT,
  match_id INT,
  points_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  blocks INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_details (
  match_id INT,
  match_date DATE,
  venue VARCHAR(255),
  winning_team VARCHAR(50),
  losing_team VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE MatchStats (match_id INT, player_id INT, points_scored INT, assists INT, blocks INT)
CREATE TABLE Player (player_id INT, player_name VARCHAR(255), team_name VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE TeamStats (team_id INT, match_id INT, total_points INT, total_assists INT, total_blocks INT)

CREATE TABLE player_performance (
  player_id INT,
  match_id INT,
  points_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  blocks INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id UUID,
    match_id UUID,
    points_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    blocks INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, match_id)
);
